text: Terry Moore (born Helen Luella Koford; January 7, 1929) is an American actress. She began her career as a child actor. in 1940. Moore was nominated for the Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress for her role in Come Back, Little Sheba (1952). Moore was in a relationship with businessman Howard Hughes from 1949 to 1976. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:Living people Category:1929 births Category:American child actors Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Glendale, California
title: Terry Moore (actress)
